Just like every other version of Loaris I have got. Instal it, Patch it, enter the name ID and serial key and the damn thing goes to a webpage that wants money to make the damn program work fully. Others analysed and found bugs but wouldn't fix them on an UNREGISTERED version. This one didn't even search for bugs!!
